text: Alyssa Lim (born 23 January 1991) is a female badminton player from England. == Achievements == ===BWF International Challenge/Series=== Women's Doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Tournament !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- style="background:#D5D5D5" |align="center"|2011 |align="left"|Portugal International |align="left"| Helen Davies |align="left"| Alex Langley Lauren Smith |align="left"|21-14, 14-21, 17-21 |style="text-align:left; background:white"| Runner-up |- |} Mixed Doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Tournament !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- style="background:#C6AEFF" |align="center"|2013 |align="left"|French International |align="left"| Marcus Ellis |align="left"| Robert Blair Imogen Bankier |align="left"|17-21, 17-21 |style="text-align:left; background:white"| Runner-up |- |- style="background:#C6AEFF" |align="center"|2012 |align="left"|Swiss International |align="left"| Ben Stawski |align="left"| Peter Kaesbauer Isabel Herttrich |align="left"|18-21, 12-21 |style="text-align:left; background:white"| Runner-up |- |} : BWF International Challenge tournament : BWF International Series tournament == References == == External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:People from Milton Keynes Category:English female badminton players
